definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: What precautionary measures should Asthma sufferers take in their daily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哮喘病患者日常生活中應採取什麼預防措施？

sentences.english: Read about about the causes of diabetes and how to prevent it.
sentences.chinese: 讀一些關於糖尿病的誘因並學會如何做好預防措施。

sentences.english: Preventive measures in industry include inerting and elimination of ignition sources.
sentences.chinese: 工業預防措施包括惰化和消除點火源。

sentences.english: Establish effective preventive measures and corrective action to ensure that deficiencies do not re-occur.
sentences.chinese: 確立有效的預防措施和糾正措施，避免錯誤再次出現。

sentences.english: The reasons for crack appearance in LPG spherical tank and the methods for prevention.
sentences.chinese: 介紹液化石油氣球罐檢驗中裂紋形成原因及預防措施。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the clinical characteristics and preventive measures of hospital-acquired septicemia in our hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索醫院感染敗血症的特點和預防措施。

sentences.english: This accident serves to show the importance of taking preventive measures.
sentences.chinese: 這次事故說明了採取預防措施的重要性。

sentences.english: Antibacterial gel pumps have been removed from the prison as a precautionary measure.
sentences.chinese: 作爲“預防措施”抗病菌凝膠泵已被拆除。”

sentences.english: Evaluate the effectiveness of NCR and CA/PA to prevent reoccurrence.
sentences.chinese: 評估糾正及預防措施的有效性以防止再發生。

sentences.english: In fact, vector control is the one and only preventive measure.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，病媒控制是唯一的預防措施。

sentences.english: This paper also discussed the pathogenic factors and protective measures.
sentences.chinese: 本文還討論了該病的致病原因和預防措施。

sentences.english: It discusses the reasons why the account beyond the law has existed, and how to prevent it.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了賬外帳存在的原因，並提出了預防措施。

sentences.english: However, there shall be no such exoneration of the Fund with regard to preventive measures.
sentences.chinese: 但是，就預防措施而言，本基金不得享有此種免除。

sentences.english: In today’s businesses, staff training is still the first line of defense.
sentences.chinese: 在當今的企業中，人員培訓仍然是重要的預防措施。

sentences.english: With such precautions the courtiers might bid defiance to contagion.
sentences.chinese: 由於採取了這些預防措施，侍臣們根本不必擔心傳染。

sentences.english: Prevention steps also include vaccinating for coliform mastitis.
sentences.chinese: 預防措施還包括接種大腸菌乳腺炎疫苗。

definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
